updates.description: The classic Wordle game with an Ashokan twist! Guess the daily word, track your winning streak, and compete on the leaderboard. New puzzles every day at midnight IST!

updates.title: Calendar Syncing!
updates.description: Sync your semester planner with Google Calendar!

updates.title: Trajectory Planner v2!
updates.description: Now you can go through trajectories repository to check trajectories posted by other students/seniors and you can post your own as well! We've also collaborated with reps to create a rep dashboard for them to be able to update their department's respective trajectories and degree requirements!
